item.name: GPFS Cluster Name - SNMP Ping
item.description: This Item checks for the availability of GPFS SNMP Date on this host.

item_prototype.name: $1: ID
item_prototype.description: The cluster ID.

item_prototype.name: $1: MinReleaseLevel
item_prototype.description: The currently enabled cluster functionality level.

item_prototype.name: $1: Name
item_prototype.description: The cluster name.

item_prototype.name: $1: Number of File Systems
item_prototype.description: The number of file systems that belong to the cluster.

item_prototype.name: $1: Number of Nodes
item_prototype.description: The number of nodes that belong to the cluster.

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Space Higher
item_prototype.description: The free disk space of the file system in kilobytes (high 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Space Lower
item_prototype.description: The free disk space of the file system in kilobytes (low 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Space Calculated
item_prototype.description: The free disk space of the file system in kilobytes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Space Calculated per second
item_prototype.description: The free disk space of the file system in kilobytes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Inodes Higher
item_prototype.description: The number of free file system inodes (high 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Inodes Lower
item_prototype.description: The number of free file system inodes (low 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Inodes Calculated
item_prototype.description: The number of free file system inodes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Inodes Calculated per second
item_prototype.description: The number of free file system inodes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Inodes Higher
item_prototype.description: The total number of file system inodes (high 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Inodes Lower
item_prototype.description: The total number of file system inodes (low 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Inodes Calculated
item_prototype.description: The total number of file system inodes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the file system.

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Space Higher
item_prototype.description: The total disk space of the file system in kilobytes (high 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Space Lower
item_prototype.description: The total disk space of the file system in kilobytes (low 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Space Calculated
item_prototype.description: The total disk space of the file system in kilobytes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Executable Status
item_prototype.description: The executable status of the file system.

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Disk Space Higher
item_prototype.description: The free disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes (high 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Disk Space Lower
item_prototype.description: The free disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes (low 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Disk Space Calculated
item_prototype.description: The free disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Free Disk Space Calculated per second
item_prototype.description: The free disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes.

item_prototype.name: $1: Belongs to
item_prototype.description: The name of the file system to which the storage pool belongs.

item_prototype.name: $1: Number of Disks
item_prototype.description: The number of disks in the storage pool.

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Disk Space Higher
item_prototype.description: The total disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes (high 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Disk Space Lower
item_prototype.description: The total disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes (low 32 bits).

item_prototype.name: $1: Total Disk Space Calculated
item_prototype.description: The total disk space in the storage pool in kilobytes.

trigger.name: No GPFS SNMP Data available - WE ARE BLIND! Take action.
trigger.description: No GPFS SNMP data is currently available from this host. You should fix this problem immediatly - we can't get any data necessary for alerting.
